entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Creek 10:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: NNE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
